```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readr, psych)
```

```{r}
weather_list <- list.files(path = "WeatherStation_Cleaned",
                           recursive = TRUE,
                           pattern = "\\.csv$",
                           full.names = TRUE)
list(weather_list)
```

```{r}
weather <- read_csv(weather_list)
glimpse(weather)
```
```{r}
describe(weather)
```
::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## Save rds

```{r}
write_rds(weather, "WeatherStation_Cleaned/weather.rds")
```
:::


::: {.callout-note collapse="true"}
## Load rds

```{r}
weather <- readRDS("WeatherStation_Cleaned/weather.rds")
```
:::
